title: WTB T201 Toronto player cards - raw, low grade
author: baseball tourist

posts.post_title: WTB T201 Toronto player cards - raw, low grade
posts.post_content:
Not a card collector (prefer ephemera and equipment) but love the look of the T201 Mecca folders and would like to a Toronto card or two to my collection. 

Are there any other cards that highlight Toronto players other than Fitzpatrick/Killian? Pls let me know what you have and how much you are asking. Thanks! Chris

[url]Chris@pacmedia.ca[/url]
